aspace_helpers.title: import new ReCAP items for AC464

comments.body:
@phoebeno 
The records are in the Sandbox; can you please QA them?

aspace_helpers.title: add scarcpph to Sandbox import profile
Do we need to add data for the Description field?

comments.body:
From @phoebeno 

> Hi Regine,
>  
> Here was my question to Don and his reply. I am happy to do as he says and look them up to fill in Description.
>  
> Truly,
> Phoebe
>  
> From: Donald R. Thornbury 
> Sent: Friday, December 9, 2022 4:36 PM
> To: Phoebe E. Nobles 
> Subject: RE: question about Alma item records
>  
> Hello Phoebe.  Yes, it’s necessary to create Description.  It’s what displays in Alma.  The bulk import profile for items includes
> NO IT DOESN’T
> The import profile omits Description.  Not my fault!  Or maybe my fault for not checking everything.  I’ll put in a GitHub ticket to fix it.  I can’t fix it myself in production.  All they had to do was copy EVERYTHING I did in sandbox.
> Anyway, blame-laying aside, yes.  If it’s a small number of items, just look them up and use the Generate button to fill in Description from Enumeration A.
>  
> Don
>  
> From: Phoebe E. Nobles 
> Sent: Friday, December 9, 2022 4:20 PM
> To: Donald R. Thornbury 
> Cc: Lynn Durgin 
> Subject: question about Alma item records
>  
> Hi Don,
>  
> Regine just helped us create a small batch of new item records for AC464, and I am noticing that the Box numbers of the existing boxes appear under both “Volume” and “Description” in Alma—but the new item records only have a box number listed under “Volume.” Do we need to make box numbers appear under the “Description” field? These are records that will not appear individually in the catalog, but exist because the boxes will be at ReCAP.
> 
> Thank you,
> Phoebe

cc @LynnDurgin 
Hi @phoebeno @doncat 

thanks for confirming! I've updated the import profile to populate the description field with the same information that goes into Enum A. @doncat, my fault entirely--this is the aspace2alma items import profile that's in the Sandbox in draft, awaiting implementation in production.

For your reference, that ticket is here: https://github.com/PrincetonUniversityLibrary/alma-config/issues/340

In the meeting this morning decided that we should:

- Check if publication even works with local storage.
- Explain on the README – if you’re developing features that use s3, s3 needs to be enabled.

Add a link to the copyright chooser in the help text
Connect WorkActivity to WorkActivityNotifications so we have a cleaner deletion process
Remove Title placeholder and add details folddown

comments.body:
I'm not sure I love the triangle.  If I wanted help on what the field was I would not think to click on a triangle.  I'll add this to the agenda so we can discuss...
![Screen Shot 2022-12-09 at 9 08 30 AM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1599081/206720472-16de07da-baea-4f5c-b838-84a7fb95af70.png)

Good point. I've filed a separate issue for this:
- #694

Since this is not the first use of the fold-down triangle, I'd prefer for this PR not to block on the styling change.

pdc_describe.title: Server-side publish files to post-curation buckets
Utilize s3 copy_to instead of downloading and uploading
Fix URI bug when editting a work in a local development environment
`URI::InvalidURIError in Works#edit`
Making UserWork explicitly related to Work so it is easier to delete a work
Field help: Replace triangle with question mark
Add funding fields to DataCite record

comments.body:
I may be confused, but I think this is already in place?
```ruby
    def self.new_from_work_resource(resource)
      mapping = ::Datacite::Mapping::Resource.new(
        ...
        funding_references: funding_reference_from_work_resource(resource)
      )
      Datacite.new(mapping)
    end
```
and the result of `PDCSerialization::Datacite.new_from_work(work).to_xml` has funder information:
```xml
  <fundingReferences>
    <fundingReference>
      <funderName>National Science Foundation</funderName>
      <awardNumber awardURI='http://asdfasf'>asdfasdf</awardNumber>
    </fundingReference>
  </fundingReferences>
```

If this isn't what you mean, it would be good for me to get this more clear in my head.

pdc_describe.title: Consistent bold styling of form labels

comments.body: I'll suggest that for consistency, all field labels use `<details><summary>` and benefit from the CSS in #704, rather than adding some other mechanism for styling labels.

pdc_describe.title: Factor out shared template for `_{pre,post}_curation_s3_resources.html.erb`
Where {pre,post}_curation_uploads strings are the same, consolidate
Present changes to string fields as a diff
Diff simple text fields in the change log

comments.body: Thinking it over, it will be better to only persist the old and new values... The details of the diffing should be left till render time. Marking as draft.
